Tabs

Rounded tab navigation. Used mostly as secondary navigation on Meetup; load the tab content with web:ajax where possible.

.nav-tabs

  • Upcoming
  • Past
  • Selected tab
  • Upcoming Meetups
  • Past Meetups
  • Selected tab

<ul class="nav-tabs">
	<li><a href="#tabs">Upcoming</a></li>
	<li><a href="#tabs">Past</a></li>
	<li class="selected"><a href="#tabs">Selected tab</a></li>
</ul>
